extendedInfo.description: Align 3 stones in a line. You can move the stones to different cells.A very simple, but challenging game.You have 3 stones, so is your opponent.Your goal is to place the three stones in a line formation on a 3x3 cells board.The tricky thing is that once you place a stone in one cell, you can only move it to a connected cell.A Traditional Board Game known by many names including âNiraâ, âPadaâ and âKallukaliâ in Kerala, India.It was played in the Roman Empire, around the first century BC. It was called Terni Lapilli. The game's grid markings have been found chalked all over Rome.DhaneW Research is giving some of the Traditional Indian Games a new Digital Avatar. This is the second Game in our âTraditional Indian Board Gameâ Series. The other one is http://www.kavidikali.com .Please let us know your feedback in review section. Good or bad, both helps us improve.If you enjoy  Go, Gomoku,  Gomoku Narabe - äºç®ä¸¦ã¹,  Gobang ,  Omok  - ì¤ëª© - äºç®, Renju,  Five in a Row, Connect 4, Chess,  Reversi,  Sudoku, Magic Cube, Hangman , Math Games, Other Brain Games, Word Games or Puzzle Games;  You must try Stone Game.  Stone Game helps train your Brain to solve complex puzzles. A Great work out for the brain that brings out the hidden genius in you.Beware, the higher levels are not for the faint of heart, you will get to know how smart you really are.Stone Game is in some ways similar to Tic Tac ToeKeywords:Tic Tac Toe, Tick-tack-toe, tic-tac-toe, tick-tat-toe, or tit-tat-toe, Noughts and Crosses, Naughts and Crosses, Wick wack woe ,Exy-Ozys, Xsie-Osies, X-e O-zees or Boxin' Oxen, X's and O's, Zero/Katta, X-Mix-Drix, Twiddles and Bears, ä¸ç®ä¸¦ã¹, í±íí ,ÐÑÐµÑÑÐ¸ÐºÐ¸ Ð½Ð¾Ð»Ð¸ÐºÐ¸, Ð¥ÑÐµÑÑÐ¸ÐºÐ¸ Ð½ÑÐ»Ð¸ÐºÐ¸, Tres en raya or Ceros y Cruces, Morpion, KÃ³Åko i krzyÅ¼yk, Tris, Nada e Cruzes, LUFFARSCHACK, Kreis Und Kreutz, OXO, TicTacToe,  Ø¯ÙØ²  ,ÙØ¹Ø¨Ø© Ø¥ÙØ³-Ø£Ù,×××§×¡ ×¢×××× ,tres en lÃ­nea,tres en raya,juego del gato,tatetÃ­, triqui, totito,triqui traka, tres en gallo, michi o la vieja, TicTacToe, 3 en lÃ­nea, 3 en raya, ÙØ¹Ø¨Ø© Ø¥ÙØ³-Ø£Ù, ÐÑÑÐ¶ÑÐºÑ-Ð½ÑÐ»ÑÐºÑ, Tres en ratlla, PiÅ¡kvorky, Kryds og bolle, Drei gewinnt, XXO, Kreis und Kreuz, Dodelschach oder engl. reviews.comment: Loving it. Super game. Go for it guys !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really like it. It\'s one of those simple games that\'s so challenging...also, it isn\'t tic tac toe...this is way better and not boring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Stuff freezes all the time talking about an alignment error. For such a simple game with basic sounds/graphics, you think they could fix it by now.
reviews.author: A Google User
